title: Adani Power close to taking over Coastal Energen for â‚¹3,440 crore
description: After two days of intense bidding, Adani Power emerged as the winner late Saturday evening, said two people with knowledge of the matter. Jindal Power, the other bidder in the fray, quit the race, they added.  The interest in Coastal Energen, undergoing corporate insolvency, is mainly because it is among a few operational power plants for sale.
